channel.title: Buff Aristocrat
channel.description:
Aristocrat is identical to Noble. Boring! Unseen converted classes are supposed to be more powerful than the original class. So, replace Snoop with:
>**Forge (2 uses)**: Read and edit a player's logs. If they die tonight, the edited version will be displayed.

item.title: Buff Aristocrat
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
Vandalay:

only noble power that could really be buffed up… is maid spy could add multi targets or something.

or snoop could be changed to forge for aristo like in the OP … lol

Would not create any confirmability problems

Read full topic

item.title: Buff Aristocrat
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
SabreOverdrive:

Only negative about this is that it is too similar to the noble.

honestly I can’t say being too similar is a negative…

The biggest thing about noble is he’s got like 40 ways to confirm himself. and almost all of them are too the stregnth level that buffing or replacing them would do more harm than good.

IE the vote manipulations… half of their value is the ability to slip past bd… “prove yourself” as noble and then have a good shot at the throne if your buddies or the NK get the king. Obviously if it were made stronger, it would actually be weaker if people could tell it from the nobles ability.

snoop, is another possible noble test… people could put keywords etc… into their journals to test if you really are noble… and so that kind of has to stay.

only noble power that could really be buffed up… is maid spy could add multi targets or something.

Read full topic

item.title: Buff Aristocrat
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
You will be surprised

Making a alch vote up a unseen when they don’t want to is powerfull

Read full topic

item.title: Buff Aristocrat
item.dc:creator: SabreOverdrive
item.description:
Noble is actually a must keep BD roie. Because of its snoop.

Most players tend to have NO logs or Double logs

With this ability. Noble can report back to the court with good information

Anyway to aristrocrat

Aristrocrat is useful to find important BD roles and to kill them. Only negative about this is that it is too similar to the noble. The aristrocrat can get unseen to win. is finding important players that could be useful to bd such as merc and alch. This case. If aristrocrat uses their 2 snoops before assassin. Then they can win

Read full topic

item.title: Buff Aristocrat
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Well I do have to say, as aristocrat, he is darn powerful in several ways… he’s royal blood, he’s “confirmable” to BD etc… Even as is I’ll fully admit, if I can find a noble as MM… While the noble may be only as strong as his bd counterpart… in the wrong hands those powers value is soo much greater. Once you know you have noble blood, you know there’s great benefits to killing the king. While you have the vote… your goal for majority is one less.

I remember winning one of my worse games ever (total crap luck, assasain caught day 2, 2 failed conversions in a row. But the possesor killed the king, and I paid close attention to the election to find a noble and princess (neither claimed on the election, and they drew). So I imidiately refocused my target to one of them… he managed to talk his way up to king the next day, and that was more or less enough to pull the unseen out of the jaws of certain defeat.

Read full topic

item.title: Buff Aristocrat
item.dc:creator: Okx
item.description:
I think Aristocrat is powerful just because they’re converted.

Usually, their abilities as Noble aren’t needed as it’s usually a BD majority.

Read full topic
